subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Talent trumped passion as the Spurs beat the Knicks for the second time in six days. The Knicks lost two of three games on their trip and flew home late Saturday with a 2-5 record.
snippet: Talent trumped passion as the Spurs beat the Knicks for the second time in six days. The Knicks lost two of three games on their trip and flew home late Saturday with a 2-5 record.
